summary: The diff only shows modifications to backend/main.mo and project_state.json. There is no evidence of changes to deployment scripts/process, backend-first ordering documentation, or any mechanism to capture/surface deployment error output. Additionally, project_state.json was modified despite redeploy request being focused on deployment correctness and avoiding new feature work.

missing_requirements.requirement: Redeploy the most recent build artifact/version of the application (frontend + backend canisters) without introducing new feature changes, using the existing production deployment process (including backend-first ordering as documented in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md).
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment-related files, scripts, or documentation changes are shown (and no frontend changes are shown). The diff does not provide evidence that the redeploy process (backend-first ordering) was implemented or that the build artifact redeploy is addressed.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the redeploy fails again, capture and surface the complete deployment error output (exact error text, command/step that failed, and whether it occurred during build, canister install/upgrade, or frontend asset deployment) and apply the minimal corrective change required to make the redeploy succeed, without altering product functionality.
missing_requirements.reason: No logging/diagnostics additions to deployment tooling are present in the diff summary, and no files that would capture deployment command output are modified/added.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json (schema/project state metadata and feature descriptions).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is about redeploying the last successful build and minimizing changes; updating project_state.json is not requested as part of deployment correctness and is explicitly listed as a non-goal area (new feature work described in project_state.json).
